alert.note: Alert for Orange County Inland; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 07 at 2:06PM PST until March 07 at 6:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...North to northeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 40 mph expected. * WHERE...San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire. The strongest winds are expected near and below the Cajon Pass. The coldest temperatures are expected in southern and eastern portions of the Inland Empire. * WHEN...Now through 6 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
